text: Ra yiniharule joda di'era allahako kasama khamdachan ki yadi tiniharuko pasama kunai nisani a'eko bha'e, ta tyasala'i avasya nai visvasa garne thi'e. Tapa'i bhanidinus ki nisaniharu ta sabai allahakai niyantranama chan ra timila'i ke thaha cha? Nisaniharu jaba a'unechan taba pani yiniharule imana lya'une chainan
